pr_title: Add methods to get the ModContainer which as provided an entrypoint

timeline.bodyText: Why? Just create an entrypoint exception right here than passing an entry set.
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: You should integrate the changes in #180 and add the other exceptions as suppressed by the first one.
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Will this be too slow time-wise? How costly memory-wise is it to track in a hash map instead?
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Also see #180, don't create a runtime exception out of the loop
timeline.author: liach

timeline.message: Add methods to get the mod which provides an entrypoint.
